availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 3

body.p:
Headquarters Dept. of the Ohio
Knoxville Tenn. Jany 11 1864
Special Orders.
No 11. }

10 " " " The resignation of Capt C. G. Neel. Co "C" 11th Ky Mtd Infty is hereby accepted "for the good of the service" to take effect Jany 13th 1864- Any balance of pay due him at that time, will be Suspended, until satisfactory evidence is furnished to the Paymaster that he is not indebted to the U. S. Govr

By command of Maj Genl Foster
Henry Curtis Jr.
A. A G

11 Cavy
Knoxville Tenn
Jany 11th 1864
Henry Curtis
A. A. G
The resignation of Capt C. G. Neel Co "C" 11th Ky Cav, to take effect from Jany 13th 1864
Recd A. G. O. Jany 27th 1864
